title: Why does Blackpink have more followers on social media than BTS if BTS is more popular? - Quora

response.answer_text:
Not all ARMY’s have social media or a youtube account as some are not old enough. Plus BTS and Blackpink have a different amount of popularity on different apps/ social media: Youtube Blackpink: 46.5 million Bangtan TV (BTS): 35.7 million Instagram blackpinkofficial: 28.2 million bts.bighitofficial: 29.2 million Twitter (doesn’t count) Blackpink: doesn’t have an account BTS_twt: 28.5 million V live Blackpink: 10.3 million BTS: 22.1 million TikTok Blackpink: 16.5 million BTS: 18.9 million Total (For the total I didn’t add BTS twitter followers) Blackpink: 101.5 million BTS: 105.9 million When it comes to youtube Blackpink does beat BTS, however on V live and Instagram BTS are the winners. Plus its obvious that not all the people that has subscribed to BTS follow them on social media. For example, I follow them on V live, twitter and youtube but not on Instagram and TikTok since I’m a closet ARMY! So followers doesn’t really determine popularity since many know that BTS is the kpop group with the biggest fandom (2nd Exo)! Hope you enjoyed my answer, feel free to ask me questions about Yoongi or BTS in general!   사랑하고 사랑하고 사랑합니다#BTS#ARMY#우리아미상받았네#BTS_Dynamite pic.twitter.com/9yuiWdqJf4— 방탄소년단 (@BTS_twt) September 1, 2020
  And of course, a special Happy (belated) Birthday to our favorite maknae - JUNGKOOKIE!! <3 -semi-

Each of the Blackpink members have their own accounts (Instagram). However, BTS doesn’t have their own individual accounts (Instagram, Twitter, etc.). There are lots of fandom accounts for the BTS members, but they aren’t the real BTS members posting. Another reason is because Blackpink is more active, at least on Instagram. Of course, Blackpink members have more advantages since they all have their individual accounts. However, BTS is more active on Twitter. Some Kpop groups are more active on some apps/websites than they are on other websites. BTS is also more famous worldwide. Yes, they are some of the top Kpop groups well-known world wide… Instagram(quite close): BTS (official account)- 29.2M+ Blackpink (official account)-28.2M+ Some other idols active on INSTA: Red Velvet -Joy, very active on EXO- Chanyeol, frequently active Got7- Jackson, active    Twitter: BTS -26.4M+ Blackpink -4.1M+ Some other idols active on TWITTER: SuperJunior- Siwon, Lots of followers on Twitter (7.1M+) Twice -5.6M+ TXT -3.9M+ Red Velvet -3.1M+   So basically, it depends on which app/website you’re talking about. On Insta, Blackpink has more followers(individually), but Blackpink Official has fewer followers than BTS Official on Insta. On Twitter, BTS has more followers, since they are more active on Twitter than Blackpink. OVERALL: BTS has more followers in the 2 main apps people use, Instagram and Twitter.
